Class ArchiveSamplesJob

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.sched.Job
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.ArchiveSamplesJob
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Job>
public class ArchiveSamplesJob extends Job
Job to create sample data archive files.
Author:
Douglas Lau

  • Field Details

    • buffer

      protected final byte[] buffer
      Buffer for reading sample data files

  • Constructor Details

    • ArchiveSamplesJob

      public ArchiveSamplesJob(SampleArchiveFactory saf)
      Create a new job to archive sample data. This needs to happen after 6 PM to allow for buffered data to be read in case of communication errors (MnDOT protocol).
